Institution Name: FEDERAL UNIVERSITY OF AGRICULTURE, ZURU, KEBBI STATE

UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Chemistry, Mathematics, Biology/Agric Science and one of Physics, Geography or Economics.
